description: Expose all Scriptboard backend tools to the MCP server. Currently only 8 tools are exposed, need to add ~55 more covering: Prompts, Attachments, Responses, Export, Session, Git, System Monitor, Orchestrator, FileManager, and Other categories.
goal: Enable Claude and other MCP clients to access all Scriptboard functionality including git management, system monitoring, file organization, orchestrator tracking, and export capabilities.
requirements: Add Prompts tools (3): list_prompts, save_prompt, load_preloaded
Add Responses tools (4): add_response, list_responses, get_summary, clear_responses
Add Export tools (4): preview, export_markdown, export_json, export_llm
Add Session tools (4): get_session, save_session, load_session, recover_autosave
Add Git tools (9): status, commit, branches, create_branch, checkout, delete_branch, pull, push, scan_repos
Add System Monitor tools (10): stats, processes, detailed_processes, kill_process, network_connections, listening_ports, disk_usage, largest_files, startup_apps
Add Orchestrator tools (6): stats, projects, stubs, workorders, plans, sync_gist
Add FileManager tools (7): organize, rename, clean, index, dupes, history, undo
Add Other tools (6): profiles, load_profile, llm_providers, llm_call, add_favorite, remove_favorite
constraints: Must follow existing MCP tool naming convention: mcp__scriptboard__{category}_{action}
Tools must handle connection errors gracefully
Keep tool descriptions concise but informative
